brews.name: Liberty Ale
brews.description: Liberty Ale uses only natural ingredients â€” pale malted barley, fresh whole-cone Cascade hops and a special top-fermenting yeast, and water.

brews.name: Christmas Ale
brews.description: The beer pours a dark, mahogany brown with a creamy, tan head. It has flavors of creamy bittersweet chocolate, coffee, and nuts with a rich mouthfeel.

brews.name: Porter
brews.description: A blend of specially roasted pale, caramel, chocolate, and black malts, along with our top-fermenting yeast, creates complexity without bitterness.

brews.name: Steam
brews.description: A blend of pale and caramel malts, fermentation with lager yeast at warmer ale temperatures in shallow open-air fermenters, and gentle carbonation.

brews.name: La Folie
brews.description: Dry-hopped with some of our hop heroes, bringing incredibly fruity aromas of zesty orange, pithy grapefruit, pungent pine and resin.

brews.name: Jack the Lad
brews.description: Spicy hops and Carafa Malt for colour, then aged in red wine barrels. On the nose there's cola, chocolate, coffee, warming oak, and spice.

brews.name: Gueze Tilquin
brews.description: A balance of sweet and salty, citrus, and caramel. Fermented at the bottom of the North Sea, which is the perfect temperature for lagers.

brews.name: Oude Kriek
brews.description: This beer is a riot of whisky, caramel and strawberry, all tempered by a toe curling bitterness enducing rapture in all who taste it.

brews.name: 90 Minute
brews.description: A 9.2% Double IPA aged for 21 months in a 1965 Invergordon cask with 30 kg of fresh strawberries. This beer is a riot of whisky and caramel.

brews.name: Boston Lager
brews.description: This beer is slightly different each year, with subtle variations due to environment. What doesn't change is the rich chocolate, bitter coffee and warmth of this lager.

brews.name: Pizza Port
brews.description: Belgian yeast and American hops untie on a cardinal scale. Steel yourself for biblical volumes of grapefruit and a wave of spicy, fruity character.

brews.name: Rochefort 8
brews.description: Brewed with mountains of Wheat, Rye, Cara and Crystal malts, fermented with an American ale yeast and bittered with Amarillo & Centennial.

brews.name: Trappist Ale
brews.description: The seductive lure of the sassy passion fruit hop proves too much to resist. There are no additives, preservatives, pasteurization or strings attached.

brews.name: XX Bitter
brews.description: XX Bitter is elegant, refined, assured, (boring) and understated. This beer is a fruity riot of blackberries, pears, and plums.

brews.name: The Fearless
brews.description: Single hopped with Mosaic for lots of tropical, passion fruit and citrus flavours. Loaded with well over 100kg of blueberries,  this is super fruity hop bomb.
